value: Canggu has a very long black sand beach

Canggu proper is a small village on the beach about 20 minutes north of
. Canggu is widely used though to refer to a large coastal stretch of about 8 km, running north from the village of
(just north of Seminyak) to the village of

along the way. It is still a largely rural area away from the beaches, but is being developed fast.

The beaches have dark grey or black sand and are not particularly good for swimming, but do offer some renowned and challenging surfing spots.

The area is popular with many expatriates who choose to live here, and a large number of the villas owned by overseas nationals are located here.  Much of the area features quietly undulating terrain with the rice paddies that typify much of south central Bali.

Taxis can be hard to find in this area and most travel tends to be by private car or motorcycle. Consider booking accommodation with a complimentary airport pickup as this is the easiest way to get to Canggu.

value: Very pastoral, Canggu offers a chance to observe the daily rhythms of
from your perch on a surfboard.
. Amongst the better beaches in this area are Berawa, Echo Beach and Pererenan.
content=This is Bali's main horse riding stables and many packages are offered. Trotting along the Canggu beaches is especially popular
. Designed by Greg Norman and is constantly voted one of the best golf courses in Asia; it is situated beside the dramatic, waved-lashed sea temple of Tanah Lot just to the north.

directions=in between Berawa and Batu Bolong Intersection
content=International style food in a large bamboo construction, nice sunset views. Organic market on Sundays, child friendly environment.
directions=directly between the Canggu Club and Berawa Beach
content=Good value restaurant in a  convenient location with nice rice field views.
content=Popular with local expats and visitors. Sunset views and a variety of eating areas. Tables spill out onto a beach side area, live music, seafood barbecues.
content=Dine in or takeaway Thai food.
content=A garden restaurant in the Pantai Berawa Area close to the surf spot. Western and Asian food for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Free WiFi, surfer shower and a garden.
content=Beachside cafe offering local food plus decent pizzas and burgers.

There is no real bar culture in Canggu, but the trendy designer bars of Seminyak are only a 20-25 minute drive away.
There are a variety of small hotels and bungalow collections in this area.  The most prevalent form of travel accommodation though is a seemingly never ending supply of private villas.

value: name=Mia House Canggu Daily Monthly Rental
content=3 bedrooms Bali Style House, fullly furnished + maid, lush tropical garden, can be rented 1 bedroom or the whole 3 bedrooms house.
content=Surf retreat. Weekly packages include meals and accommodation. Surfing lessons, yoga, massages and temple trips can all be added to your package.
content=A homestay with sea and rice field view. 1 minute walk to the surf beach at Pererenan.
content=A surfers resort. Weekly packages include breakfast, accommodation and surf-guiding. Yoga, massages and temple trips can be organised.
directions=on Berawa beach, the southern part of greater Canggu
content=A long established hotel. More than a bit run down, but has a good quality spa and restaurant. Single room accommodation and beachfront cottages.
content=Tropical house, arranged in a traditional Balinese style of architecture.

content=Each room in this self-styled "village" is situated in an antique house, with a newly refurbished interior. Saltwater pool, spa, a restaurant with many organic and vegetarian options, and yoga classes twice daily.
content=Beach-side hotel with good service and numerous dining and spa options. Contains many Indonesian antiques and beautiful relics. Worth a visit just for the antiques and restaurant.
content=6-bedroom villa with stunning views of rice terraces and extensive collection of Indonesian antiques.
content=Balinese architecture with modern facilities. Large swimming pool, games room, shared tennis court, 4 bedrooms. Fully staffed villa ideal for families.
content=2, 3 and 4 bedroom private pool villas only 250 m to the beach
price=2-bedroom villa from US $155 per villa per night
content=5 private villas, 2, 3 or 4 bedroom villas each with its own pool, 24 hr security, concierge, and room service.
content=5 bedroom beachfront home between rice fields and the ocean in the traditional village of Cemagi, Fully staffed, 20 m swimming pool, tennis court and games room.
address=Jl. Subak Sari No. 7, Br. Tegal Gundul, Ds. Tibu Beneng
content=1-2 bedroom villa, all fitted with private swimming pool, elegant living space and lush tropical landscape.

content=Large private villa built in 2007. Good location. 17 m swimming pool and fully equipped gym. The Buwit River borders the gardens. 5 bedrooms, private pool and garden. Fully staffed including private cook and maids.
directions=turn down Jl Pantai Pererenan, off Jl Raya Canggu
content=3 bedroom villa with traditional-style living and sleeping pavilions, tropical gardens and fish ponds.

content=5 bedroom villa, with 30 m swimming pool, 7,000² m of gardens surrounded by rice fields and within walking distance of the beach. Guests have access to the sporting and social facilities at the nearby Canggu Club.

content=Fully staffed 4 bedroom villa is designed in traditional Bali style with individual antique joglos for each of the rooms. Bar and chill-out area, 20 m private pool, kitchen, dining room for 12, main living room and entertainment room.
content=5 bedroom villa with 1,000² m private spa on a spur of land at the confluence of two rivers. Walking distance from the beach. Fully staffed, car and driver included.

content=Accessed via its own 150 m driveway and bridge. 5 bedroom villa in a secluded rice field location. Various buildings, all with traditional Balinese alang-alang (thatched) roofs, frame the gardens and the large suites of the house. The mature garden and numerous water features lead down to a large lava rock swimming pool.
content=1, 2, 4 and 7 bedroom villa with private pool.
content=Modern 4 bedroom villa with TV room, pool and lush garden. Comes fully staffed and includes cook and security.

content=3 bedroom retreat with swimming pool and large garden. Single-storey villa is neo-colonial in style, similar to the Dutch guesthouses in Java, characterised by louvred shutters, old teak doors and high wooden ceilings built of old timbers. The villa is fully staffed and has a private swimming pool.
content=Private villa in the rice paddies. The villa comes with car, driver and personal chef.
content=5 bedrooms villa. Sunset views over the Indian Ocean.

content=4 bedroom villa (with two studies convertible into extra bedrooms), 100 m of private beach frontage, lush tropical landscape and bordering rice fields. Fully staffed, 18 m swimming pool. The villa combines traditional materials with local artifacts.
The bright lights, shopping centres and nightlife of
, famed for its sunsets, and the Nirwana golf course is 20 minutes away by car.
